The gastric juices the girl was coated in started off just slightly acidic, crisping her hair and cleansing her skin of her make-up. But it soon grew stronger. As the acid slipped down beneath the outer layer of skin the thin layer of fat was consumed with painful thoroughness as it seemed that each nerve was individually burned out. If anyone could have seen the girl they might have noticed how her skin was no longer firm. It was in fact loose now that her body fat was being liquified.

The girl struggled, clawing at his stomach lining with her neatly manicured nails, but her fingers had little effect on his stomach. In fact all she achieved by digging her fingers into the folds of his stomach was to immerse her delicate fingers in the source of his digestive juices, which happily burned away her fingers, reducing her hands to burning stumps of pain and filling Lenny with the energy of her digestion.

With his belly convulsed by the digesting policewoman's agonising struggles Lenny decided to crash out in his bunk in the back of the squad room. This was where officers would sometimes crash when pulling a double shift but in most cases it was for when an officer was too drunk to drive home.

Laying on his back he felt the bony shoulders of the girl in his stomach as she still fought her digestion. He could already tell that her softer flesh, such as her breasts and buttocks, had already been reduced by his gastric juices to a nourishing broth of proteins and fats that were already being absorbed by his intestines.

Her muscles, connective tissues and bones would take much longer as he intended to enjoy every last moment of her digestion. This was a digestive experience the young policewoman was already regretting as the acid of his stomach burned out her eyes and ears, stripping her skull down to the bone. But still she remained aware of her situation.

There was a flush of new energy that almost woke Lenny from the drowsy sleep that he had slipped into, a flash of the policewoman's soul as her brain was consumed, but her agony continued. Her awareness and pain would continue through her digestion and beyond.

With her body destroyed the policewoman's remains were passing out of his stomach and into his intestines where he would harvest all the useful substance from her body. This was fortunately something he was able to do in his sleep, which was exactly what he did.

Lenny slept soundly until morning when . . .
1411111.title: Crashing out in the  Station House

choices: Lenny heads home before anyone notices?
Didn't Lenny eat two women last night?
14111111.content:
“Well how hard can it be to find him?” Those were the words that dragged Lenny from his pleasant dreams. Dreams in which the Chief screaming at him never featured, unlike in his waking life when some was usually shouting at him.

Lenny couldn't make out what his fellow officers were saying back to the Chief as they weren't yelling, but from the stamping around it was clear that no one was happy.

“Get everyone back here now!” In response to the Chief's demand the officers hit the phones and radios to call in everyone on duty, and not being as stupid as most people thought he was, Lenny realised that would probably involve him as well.

Lenny hated it when the Chief was in a shouty mood so rolling out of bed he staggered off to the wash room to tidy himself up. He was always being criticised for the state of his uniform and having just slept in his uniform even he knew that he looked a bit of a mess.

He clearly wasn't alone when it came to uniform issues as he noticed various items of police uniforms laying around. At least he couldn't be blamed for that mess as the uniform clearly belonged to someone much smaller than him.

Intending to take a quick dump he was surprised just how long it took, making him really start to panic as the Chief might not think he was busy enough. Lenny had learned long ago that it was important to look like you were busy as otherwise people found things for you to do. Flushing the toilet he straightened up his uniform the best he could and staggered back to the squad room where the Chief was giving a presentation.

Actually the Chief was trying to give a presentation but the old cleaning woman kept interrupting him.

“Yes I know that nobody should go into your storage cupboard, but this is far more important.” The Chief was restraining himself from shouting at the cleaner like he would most of his Officers, being very aware that last time he'd insulted her he'd found out just what cleaning products could do to any personal belonging he let out of his sight. Not a mistake he really wanted to make again but the woman was making him loose his concentration.

“Now, Chris Smith is his name and the mayor has just hired him so it will look really bad if you can't find him.”

A missing person search?

This was something Lenny might even be able to help with.
“So I need someone to check his online activities . . “ Officer Kim raised her hand, which was no surprise given the Chief's policy of assigning roles based on stereotypes that the Asian officer was given any computer based task.

“Now I need a team to check out the South Side, that will be you Leroy and you Latoya. Make sure our boy hasn't gotten himself into any trouble with the . . .”

“Mr Chief! Some idiot's taken a dump in my bucket!” The short cleaning woman was now holding up her mop bucket for everyone to see.

Now Lenny had no great interest in sticking his head in a bucket of poop but he knew that if it came his way then he might have to . . . oh. The business woman from last night.

Lenny realised that the cleaner would be less than happy with him if she knew that it was him that had used her mop bucket as a toilet.

“Sir. What was the name of the District Attorney we are looking for?” It was one of the rookies, a red headed girl that Lenny hadn't seen before.

Lenny felt a new thought nibbling at the edge of his mind but he was already struggling with thoughts of how angry the cleaning woman would be with him.

The Chief seemed to freeze for a moment, silent except for the sound of his grinding teeth. He swallowed the expletive he was about to scream at his Officers, not wanting another row with the Sons (and Daughters) of Ireland's Policing Association. No, he could really do without finding all his uniforms dyed green again if he upset them.

“We are looking for Christopher Smith. Anyone else having trouble remembering?”

Lenny felt sorry for his fellow officer and was almost shrinking in sympathy but the young rookie just held up her hand again.

“Yes!” Now from the tone the Chief was using Lenny was really happy that it wasn't being directed his way.

“Sir, are you sure it's not Christine Smithers?” She was holding out a driving license that she had picked out of the bucket of poop.

All the Officers seemed to relax, realising that the search would probably not be needed, but Lenny suddenly realised that he was probably the one who had eaten and digested the new District Attorney.

“Christine Smithers? “ The Chief stalked over to the young rookie and her bucket of poop.

Now one of the Chief's many faults was that he was a little bit deaf, probably caused by all the shouting as far as Lenny might have guessed if anyone had ever asked him. But Lenny was smart enough to avoid doing or saying anything that might point out his bosses faults.

“LENNY!” Like magic, the Officers around him stepped back, making it impossible for Lenny to try and hide.

“Did you eat our new DA last night?”

A clever Officer might have pointed out that the Chief had ordered Lenny to eat the “business woman”, but that would have been a mistake.

A mistake that Lenny was fortunately too stupid to make.

It was pure instinct that made him react by pulling the mental strings that still linked him to his recent meals and in an instant the mop bucket was surrounded by a white glow, then the red headed rookie found herself trying to hold the reformed woman who as it turned out was the missing DA.

The two women fell into a heap, made worse when the Chief leaped in to help the tangled women.

In the confusion Lenny suddenly realised that no one was looking his way any more.

Maybe this would be a good time to get out of here?
14111111.title: The Chief's shouting woke him up?

choices: Lenny heads home, he wasn't meant to work today anyway.
Lenny tries to explain to everyone why it's not his fault.
141111112.content:
Seeing the Chief trying to untangle their new District Attorney from the mop bucket and the Policewoman who had been holding it Lenny decided to get out of here. Other, less involved officers, were crowding around and being as much help as clowns fixing a circus clown car but Lenny knew that helping wouldn't help him.

Lenny also knew that the fact that the Chief had told him to swallow and digest the woman that turned out to by the DA, wouldn't count for much when it came to assigning blame.

The fact that someone else had arrested her then bound and gagged her should have absolved Lenny of any blame, but it wouldn't.

Lenny knew that when the brown stuff hit the fan he usually ended up covered in it, which was probably an unfortunate thought as the big Police Officer had almost made it to the door when he was surprised by the sight of a naked woman covered from head to to in excrement, a woman that was shouting at him!

Lenny backed away from the shit covered woman, returning to the room where the newly reformed District Attorney, was making her views known now that her mouth was no longer taped over. She was also complaining that her clothing, that had reformed along with her, now reeked of cleaning products thanks to the bucket. Lenny was probably going to get the blame for not using one of the authorised buckets as well as just for digesting the attorney.

The shit covered woman wiped her face, and suddenly Lenny's brain finally caught up with events. He remembered her from . .

“It's you! How did . . .” But like always the angry women interrupted Lenny.

“You complete imbecile, you flushed me down the latrine!” Well that would explain how she became covered in excrement but he felt it unfair to blame him as the shouty Chief had confused him last night.

“It was her!” The new DA was pointing at the shit covered Policewoman. It seems the rookie policewoman was the one who had arrested the DA for trying to park in her own parking space.

The shitty Officer seemed confused, but then she had probably been busy climbing out the septic tank when they had realised what had happened to the DA.

“It was him!” Now both the DA and the shit covered policewoman were pointing at Lenny, which was quite unfair as all he had done was to eat the two women.

This was typical of his bad luck that instead of turning on each other as women inevitably did in the late night grumble flicks he watched, they were attacking him. It was so unfair, especially since one of the women already looked like she's been mud wrestling.

Trying to placate at least one of the women he grabbed the discarded shirt from the floor and tried to dress her.
“Do you want to put this on?” He realised his mistake when her relatively clean uniform shirt became stained with the shit that coated the woman.

With a scream of rage the naked woman stalked outside but with the furious DA also screaming at him there was nothing else Lenny could do but follow the naked Officer. At least he could try to help her as the DA was far to scary.

The woman was stomping about the yard, still making vile allegations about Lenny's parentage while other officers were undecided on whether or how to help her. In other circumstances it would have been easy but no one wanted to get coated in the muck from the septic tank.

Fortunately Lenny thought he had the answer when he noticed that the fire hose used to wash the squad cars hadn't been put away. Deciding, against all the previous advice he had ever been given, to show some initiative he turned the tap on full blast and pointing the hose at the filthy police woman he almost knocked her off her feet with the fire hose.

With hindsight it was probably a mistake.

The high pressure water jet did remove most traces of excrement from the angry policewoman, but the officers nearby who were also caught up in it were less happy. Even those that had been streaming the naked policewoman online seemed angry with Lenny just because the ended up soaked with shitty water.

It was at that moment that Lenny decided that his day couldn't get any worse.
141111112.title: Didn't Lenny eat two women last night?

choices: Mike and Jane: Married Couple that might have the kids for dinner tonight
Andrea: The beauty with self respect put into a conundrum, to be a regular meal
Make Your Own Adventure
Make Your Own Adventure
Reader's Choice
15.content:
Ill give a couple of examples and leave the rest to be reader's choice

Mike and Jane:A married couple, the look good enough for being almost middle aged, though they still have some youth left. Mike works as a detective, though fortunately in a rather boring part of town. Jane is a tutor that helps students get their grades up, or else. They also have a pair of teen daughters. Picture perfect, sweet, attractive, smart, athletic. Though they can be very obnoxious and a handful for the parents sometimes. And they do just look so delicious.

Andrea: A 24 year old latin beauty with raven hair and an amazing body. She however has worked hard to get a law degree and is now looking to get with the largest firm in the city. She is a hard worker, and the head of the firm meets with her to see if she can get an internship. He offers a deal, meal entertainment and a meal once a week and she has a job. Hard choice, she views herself as better than that, but there is no better resume that this firm.
15.title: Average Person in the World

choices: The Parents agree to do the challenge
The parents point out they could just go ahead and eat them
They get a call from one of Rosa's teachers
151.content:
Mike yawned as he entered the house. It was just after six on a friday night. Monday was a holiday and he hoped that he wouldn't get called in to work on a case. Mike had come from a Sicilian family and his olive skin showed that. "Jane?" He called out.

"Yes honey?" His wife said coming around the corner. His wife was puerto rican and was still stunning in her mid-30s. She smiled as she wiped her hands on her jeans, she wore a tank top.

"Hey do you know what is for dinner. Im sorry, Im just starved, was working on a case all day." He said sounding tired as he hung his jacket up on the wall.

"No criminals for you to eat." One of his daughters said. It was his youngest Rosa, no doubt happy to have Monday off from school. She was still a freshmen at high school. Her parents gave her and her sister an exotic beauty, tanned dusky skin. Rosa had he mother's raven hair that went to her chest. She wore a short and frilly white tank top that didn't cover all of her belly and jean shorts.

"No Rosa not today." He said with a shake of his head.

"Dont worry we'll find you something to eat." His wife said patting his shoulder. At that moment the door opened. Rosa's older sister Juliana entered. She was older, about to go into her senior year at the school.

"How as track practice?" Her mother asked.

"It was fine." She said smiling. She was a very pretty girl, her skin just a shad lighter than her sister's, her hair was also dark but currently in a ponytail. Much of her body was exposed, she wore very short and tight running shorts and a pink sports bra. "Let me guess mom cant figure out dinner and dad didn't eat all day."

"And yet you have Bs instead of As." Her father muttered. Juliana rolled her eyes as Rosa chuckled.

"Rosie you have the same GPA as me shut it." The older daughter said.

"Slightly higher actually." Her younger sister replied putting on an innocent smile.

"Girls you are so obnoxious. Stop holding me up from actually making me dinner would you." Mike shook his head and looked at Jane. "Yes me and my siblings were just as bad. But still you said it yourself that you were starving."

"We could do the 'Cash or Food' challenge." Julianna said with a chuckle.

Rosa gasped a bit. "Um- well, we both need to combine our money to get that used car." She said.

"What is this Cash or Food challenge?" Mike said looking around.

"Ive heard of it." Jane said smirking at her two daughters. "Its something students are playing with their parents these days. They play a card game, if the kids win they get five-hundred dollars from the parents."

"Yeah thats too much money."

His wife held up her hand. "But if the parents win they get to eat the kids." She looked at her two children and raised an eyebrow. "And digest them as painfully as they want you realize."

"Yeah, that is true." Juliana muttered. "But hey dad gets dinner right?" Mike looked back and forth, his stomach rumbling. The two daughters did look delicious. They were very fit and they would taste very good. Parents could eat their kids if they wanted, often times for punishment, and would often digest them painfully. Still though did he want to put five-hundred dollars on the line?
151.title: Mike and Jane: Married Couple that might have t...

choices: Mike decides to eat Rosa
Mike decides to eat Juliana
Mike lets Jane decided which daughter she wants to eat
1511.content:
"I mean honey if you dont mind spending the weekend with me digesting a daughter of ours." He said looking at his wife.

"Oh I wouldn't mind at all." His wife replied with a smile. She looked at her daughters. "Girls, you do realize that if we win we are going to digest you incredibly painfully right? I mean, your screams are so cute, and you begging me sounds like pure entertainment for the weekend. As is putting you two in jars for Monday." Jane chuckled.

"Yes, we doubted you would be merciful if you won." Juliana replied with a sigh. "But if we each get 500 dollars we can finally get that car."

"Okay." Mike's wife said with a raised eyebrow. "Juliana is dressed fine for consumption, but Rosa dont you need to change into something more suitable for the challenge?"

"One minuet mom." She said running up stairs. The dusky beauty came down a moment later wearing a strapless red bikini. "Ta-da." She said with a smile.

"You both do look very tasty." Jane said to her daughters. "Now we also have to tie you up during the game so you cant escape if you lose." She said grinning.

"Fine." Juliana muttered. "You already know all the rules apparently." Jane took Rosa by the arm as Mike took Juliana by the arm. They went over to the family table where they would play board and card games. "Don't complain how tight it is." Jane said as she tied up Rosa.

"Ooopmh" Rosa groaned as a rope was cinched around her waist. Her mother then bound her ankles to the chair legs and tied a rope above and below her chest and secured it to the chair. Jane then did the same to Juliana.

"What game?" Mike asked getting a deck of cards.

"How about we go real old school with 'Go Fish'." Jane said smirking.

"Really?" Rosa asked raising an eyebrow.

"Sure, if me or your father wins then you get digested and put into a jar. If either of yall win then you get to avoid a smellier fate and get a car." Jane said.

"Fine." Rosa muttered as Mike dished out the cards.

The game started, it seemed almost silly with them saying 'go fish', however it went on and on. "Crap." Juliana muttered as they saw their father almost get rid of all his cards.

"Rosa?"

"Yes dad?" She asked nervously.

"Do you have a jack?"

Rosa held her head a bit her lip as she handed over the card to her father. "There you go." She muttered.

"Thank you." Mike said. "Oh look at that, Im out of cards, and it looks like my daughters are out of time." Rosa held her head and actually had tears in her eyes.

"Um." Juliana muttered breathing hard and nervous. "I don't suppose you would like to make this an IOU, or at least be a bit merciful to us." Mike and Jane meanwhile walked around the table and circled their daughters.

"Look at this Mike, two mouthwatering girls all bound and helpless."

"I bet their cries are very cute." Mike replied.

Rosa sobbed and looked up. "Come on mom, dad. You don't have to make it agonizing."

"Ah, dont worry baby. It will only be agonizing for a day or two. So Mike, you're the hungry one. Which one do you want to eat?" Mike licked his lips. Juliana was slightly taller, her angelic face was sweet looking, and her toned body was still a bit sweaty from track practice. Rosa was a bit smaller but her thighs looked great, both their bellies looked great. Of course, bellies were usually the tastiest part of a female.
1511.title: Appetizing Dinner

choices: Jane eats Juliana feet first
Jane eats Juliana head first
Jane whips Juliana's body first to tenderize it
15111.content:
"I think I should just eat Rosa now so she gets it over with sooner." Mike says smirking. Rosa takes a deep breath, though her perky chest keeps rising and falling in nervousness of the pain to come. Mike and Jane untie her slowly, they then lay her onto the table, binding her wrists and elbows above her head and then binding her knees and ankles in meal tape. Sticky tape that was digestible and copied the taste of whatever it was put on.

"You look so dilicious Rosie." Jane says using her long and hard fingernails to tickle her exposed tummy.

"No-momahahah-plehahasthapahahap!" Mike licks his lips as he looks at Rosa's athletic and toned body that was only clad in a small bikini. He takes in Rosa's feet, making her jump as Jane continues to lightly tickle her belly, sides and ribs, making her squirm.

"This is your first time getting vored isn't it?" Jane said. "Dont worry, youll be reformed. Julie was given detention last year by her teacher Mr. Glutsun."

"He digested me as long and painfully as possible because I forgot homework." Juliana muttered plainly.

"I think your just still accept we let him keep you over labor day weekend." Jane said giving Rosa's belly a harsh slap. Making her squeak and jump.

"Mom please!"

"Oh hush Rosa, this tenderizes you and helps make digestion even more painful." With that she continued to slap her belly, living her dusky brown skin a reddish shade as Mike moved up her calves and towards her thighs. They were toned and athletic from her sports. Mike loved the taste of his daughter, she was very filling as tasted delectable. Her cries would be very enjoyable and entertaining as she digested in agony.

"You know mother Im more annoyed that you gave Mr. Glutsun carte blanche to treat me however he wanted that weekend." Jane said rolling her eyes.

"Now now, dont complain that you got treated like the food you were, I got detention too when I was in school." Mike meanwhile swallowed, bringing in more of Rosa's thighs. She was overwhelmed, feeling her luscious legs being squeezed into the hot and slimy esophagus. She whimpered as her mother continued to slap her burning and stinging belly. Mike meanwhile brought in her reat end and swallowed again. He then manuvered his enlarged tongue as Jane finally stopped slapping her belly. Bellies tasted the best and he enjoyed tasting every inch of her burning and quivering belly. It was tender now, and hot from pain, it also now had a light sheen of sweat to it. It was also toned and had a deep round navel that tasted just as good.

"Enjoy her belly hun. I guess Ill just go tickle Julie until I can eat."

"No, dont, dont tickle my belly! Stop-no-hahahasthahahap!" Juliana cried out as for the next twenty minuets Mike slowly ate Rosa's midsection. Rosa gasped as most of her body was in her father's maw now. With a swallow her breasts were brought in.

"Oh no, oh no. Please dont be too painful." She begged as the lips went around her neck.

"And luck at that artwork as he lifts up and lets gravity do the work of bringing her head and arms in." Jane said as she tickled her older daughter. Then he closes her fingers one by one and swallowed.

Mike sat up. "Oh that was delicious dear! Very good." He patted his belly, under his shirt was a skin tight silhouette of Rosa, navel and all.

Meanwhile in his churning stomach Rosa was in a vertical hogtied. Her arms were pinned behind her, and her legs bent at the knees, her toes touching her fingertips. It was hot and sweltering in the belly, churning noises were heard, the skin pressed into her so tightly she couldn't move and could barely talk. She felt the digestive juices coating every part of her body, her tender belly especially. It started off as an inch that started to burn like thousands of tiny white hot claws. "Oh god its starting to hurt please dont!" She begged.

"Now now, just digest like a good girl." Mike said with a chuckle as he patted his belly. "Now honey how are you going to eat Juliana?"

"Hmm, good question." Jane said. Meanwhile in Mike's belly Rosa continued to struggle. It felt as though white hot sandpaper was being put against her belly, and as though white hot claws and nails were attacking every single one of her skin cells. She couldnt take this, not for two days. Then, she didn't want to think about what it was going to be like being put into a jar. Then she let out an excruciating scream.
15111.title: Rosa gets devoured

choices: Paige confronts the predator?
Paige plays it safe, wait until he leaves?
I don't like Paige, so here's my character
153.content:
Blinking didn't stop the man's stomach acids from stinging her eyes.

It had only been an hour ago when she had refused the drunken fraternity boy's offer of a drink, explaining that she was still working. But it turned out that the boy wouldn't take no for an answer.

Now she was squeezed into the boy's gut, having been surprised when she took a break at the kitchen door of the restaurant. The frat boy had startled her as she sat by the waste bin checking for updates on her phone and when he asked about eating something she had misunderstood his intentions.

It was an easy mistake to make and being a server in a restaurant Paige had assumed he wanted to take her out for a meal, something she was hardly be likely to do given she still had a shift to finish and besides, she could hardly go out in her waitress uniform.

But Paige was always making this mistake and it really shouldn't have been a surprise when the cute frat boy turned out to be a hungry predator. He grabbed her, clothes and all, and ate her in only a few gulps.

Paige was chugged down like a cheap beer.

As she contemplated her immediate future Paige knew that it wouldn't be long before the stinging turned to excruciating agony as she sank deeper into his guts.

The only relief came when he chugged down another beer, giving her a brief respite from the pain of her digestion as the frat boy's beer washed over her.

That was one of the worse aspects of Paige's current situation as not only was she unlikely to be paid for only completing half her shift at the restaurant, but the frat boy was in a bar, chatting up girls and boasting about what a great hunter he was. Her futile cries for help only encouraging his boasting.

So although her throat was hoarse from her screams of agony she just couldn't keep silent as her skirt finally disintegrated and let the thick acids of the boy's stomach flow more freely against her burning loins. This was the part of digestion she hated the most but it was her bad luck that she never blacked out.

Paige felt her burning prison shift and suddenly her world started to rock in time to music as the frat boy hit the dance floor. The movement churned up the boy's digestive juices and as the acid burned rags of her uniform finally fell apart the girl found her skin exposed to the burning acids.

Her screams went unheard under the loud dance music and she tried to claw at the insides of his stomach. This was waste of energy given that the digestion of her limbs had already reached the point where her fingers were little more than stubs of bone at the ends of her acid burned arms.

But the fraternity boy who had swallowed her was having a great time and the sight of his full belly reassured the girls he danced with that they were in no danger. In fact Paige's struggles, clearly visible beneath his stretched skin, where particularly attractive to some girls who slow danced with the boy just so they could press against his full belly.

Inside the burning cauldron of digestion Paige didn't appreciate the fact that the party girls were pressing their still perfect breasts against her own acid ravaged breasts, but at least their actions were speeding up the process that would eventually end her pain.

After some hours of drinking and dancing, the frat boy got lucky, invited back to the drunk girl's apartment.

Despite all the pain she had endured Paige was still fully aware of her circumstances. The frat boy's romantic conquest was still playing with the still undigested lump of pain which had become Paige's existence.

Laying back on the bed the girl mounted the fraternity boy, riding him hard as she squashed Paige and accidentally brought the waitresses digestion to an end as her lungs filled with acid which consumed her from within.

In the hours that followed Paige was reduced to a stinky residue that during the night the frat boy disposed of in the careless way that boys do when they are drunk. Not that he cared as once Paige was no longer filling his stomach, he took the opportunity to swallow the good-time-girl who had the misfortune to be awoken by his stomach acids.

The next morning, before the frat boy headed back to the fraternity house, he remembered the meal he'd picked up on the way to the bar and with an effort of will triggered the reformation of Paige.

That was how Paige woke up in a stranger's apartment.

Like always she felt invigorated by the process of reformation, a uphoric sensation that left longer lasting memories than those of her painful digestion.

But as Paige became aware of her surrounding she could hear the sound of the frat boy getting dressed in the next room.

She needs to decide whether to confront the boy who ate her without permission, or maybe just let it go and go about her day?
153.title: Paige the unlucky waitress

info.brief_description: In a world were vore is normal people can be devoured and reformed.  Enjoy the digestion
info.description:
This is a world where in the 20th century a strange experiment caused the entire world to undergo a change. Certain people gained the ability to vore other humans orally. To devour them whole. However when a human was eaten they would eventually be reformed. However, it was not that straight forward. The devourer had complete control. Digestion was usually very, very painful, but the devour controlled just how painful it was. And of course nature had to run its course. Even once someone was completely digested they still had a consciousness that could feel their, remains, the residual burning as they were reduced to a smellier state. The devourer controlled how long they remained in this state, though it became progressively harder after a month, and this lead to vore becoming a part of life.

Perhaps vore is most seen in high school, where teachers can vore students for detention. Females are usually the tastiest and while teachers are suppose to follow the rules that doesn't mean they wont try to give detention out to the smart good nature girl for the smallest infraction. Detention times can vary.

Of course there are also companies that film willing meals being agonizingly digested in order to film it and sell it. Many pretty ladies have paid for college by spending an excruciating weekend a month digesting in someone's gut.

Police can also vore, though due to time constraints this isn't always the most practical option, and there is a rumor going around of a black market vore slaves trade. Are some dirty cops behind it?

And there are of course other willing and nonwilling situations out there.

Obviously the system is ripe for abuse, and it is abused constantly, but hey, hard to fight the system when you're being digested.
